CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL( Cancel_Request_Result__c, "") && NOT(ISBLANK( Cancel_Request_Received__c)) , "Pending Cancellation"&BR(), "")&
IF(NOT(Total_Open_Discrepancies__c = 0), "Open Discrepancy"&BR(), "")& IF( ISPICKVAL( Sales_Alert__c, "Yes") && ISPICKVAL( Sales_Alert_Result__c, "") , "Open Sales Alert"&BR(), "")& IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Split_Delete_Start_Date__c)) && ISBLANK(Split_Delete_End_Date__c) , "Pending Split Delete"&BR(), "")& IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Pending_MMS_Validation_Sent__c)) && ISBLANK(Pending_MMS_Validation_Received__c) , "Pending MMS Valdiation"&BR() , "")& IF(NTP__c == true && ISBLANK(Classification_Coding_Census_Updates__c), "Pending NTP Employees"&BR(), "") & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Payroll_Issue__c)) && ISBLANK(Payroll_Verified__c), "Open Payroll Issue"&BR(), "")& IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Setup_Delay_Start__c )) && ISBLANK( Setup_Delay_End__c ) , "Setup is currently delayed"&BR(), "")
CustomField.label: Open Onboarding Issues
